Package org.drip.analytics.cashflow

Class CompositeFloatingPeriod

java.lang.Object
org.drip.analytics.cashflow.CompositePeriod
org.drip.analytics.cashflow.CompositeFloatingPeriod
public class CompositeFloatingPeriod
extends CompositePeriod
CompositeFloatingPeriod implements the Composite Floating Coupon Period Functionality. It customizes the Period Quote Set and the Basis Quote for the Floating Period.

  • Module = Product Core Module
  • Library = Fixed Income Analytics
  • Project = Date, Cash Flow, and Cash Flow Period Measure Generation Utilities
  • Package = Unit and Composite Cash Flow Periods
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
